alert.note: Alert for Henry; Oldham; Shelby; Spencer; Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:30PM EDT until April 05 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SPENCER...EASTERN OLDHAM...SHELBY...SOUTHERN TRIMBLE AND WESTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bedford to 8 miles south of La Grange to Taylorsville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, La Grange, New Castle, Taylorsville, Bedford, Pendleton, Eminence, Simpsonville, Campbellsburg and Bethlehem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms have produced severe wind damage across portions of Louisville. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
